headline.main: NBCUniversal Invested $500 Million in Snap Inc as Part of IPO
headline.print_headline: NBCUniversal Invested $500 Million in Snap Inc as Part of IPO

lead_paragraph: As shares of California-based Snap Inc began trading on the New York Stock Exchange on Thursday, two dozen residents of the company's adopted home of Venice Beach protested outside its offices, accusing the growing tech company of spoiling their seaside community.
